subject: Software Developer Opportunity | oliveboard
content:
Dear Hiring Manager,

My name is Sameer Bagul, a final-year B.Tech (Information Technology) student at PES Modern College of Engineering, Pune. I am a Full-Stack & AI Developer with DevOps expertise, bringing 2+ years of freelancing and professional experience in building scalable web applications, AI-driven platforms, and modern deployment pipelines.

In addition to my internships, my freelancing background has given me the opportunity to deliver high-quality solutions to real clients, enhancing my skills in end-to-end project execution, communication, and business impact. This blend of industry, freelance, and academic experience makes me confident in my ability to take ownership of projects and excel in software development roles at oliveboard.

Professional Experience

  • LabsCheck, Pune – Built full-stack systems and automated lead operations for 100,000+ leads using AI agents; deployed medical lab platforms with Docker, Nginx & CI/CD achieving 99% uptime.
  • Walnut Solutions – Developed responsive Next.js applications, improving SEO and engagement by 30%, integrated APIs, and optimized UI performance.
  • Freelance Projects – Delivered custom software solutions such as BillCraft (multi-shop billing platform) and other MERN/Next.js platforms, driving measurable client growth and efficiency.

Key Projects

  • HireMe | Skillify – AI-powered skill development platform with 1,000+ users; Smart India Hackathon Winner 2024.
  • BillCraft (Freelance) – Multi-shop billing system for 18+ outlets and 200+ products with analytics dashboards.
  • Evento – Event management platform in Next.js, increasing student participation by 25% and supporting 500+ concurrent users.

Technical Skills

Languages: JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Java, C, C++
Frameworks: MERN, Next.js, React.js, Three.js
Databases: MongoDB, SQL, Firebase
DevOps: Docker, Nginx, Git, CI/CD, Portainer
AI/ML: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face, LangChain, NLP

Recognized as a Smart India Hackathon Winner and National Hackathon Champion, I bring not only technical depth but also leadership, having mentored 200+ students as Technical Lead of the APP Club. With my proven track record of delivering impactful freelance and professional projects, I believe I am well-positioned to contribute meaningfully at oliveboard.

Please find my resume attached for your consideration. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how I can support your team’s goals and deliver high-quality software solutions.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,

Sameer Bagul

Pune, India

+91 7841941033

sameerbagul2004@gmail.com

Portfolio | GitHub | LinkedIn

Professional Experience

  • LabsCheck, Pune – Built full-stack systems and automated lead operations for 100,000+ leads using AI agents; deployed medical lab platforms with Docker, Nginx & CI/CD achieving 99% uptime.

AI/ML: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face, LangChain, NLP

My name is Sameer Bagul, a final-year B.Tech (Information Technology) student at PES Modern College of Engineering, Pune. I am a Full-Stack & AI Developer with DevOps expertise, bringing 2+ years of freelancing and professional experience in building scalable web applications, AI-driven platforms, and modern deployment pipelines.

In addition to my internships, my freelancing background has given me the opportunity to deliver high-quality solutions to real clients, enhancing my skills in end-to-end project execution, communication, and business impact. This blend of industry, freelance, and academic experience makes me confident in my ability to take ownership of projects and excel in software development roles at Unwired Labs.

Professional Experience

  • LabsCheck, Pune – Built full-stack systems and automated lead operations for 100,000+ leads using AI agents; deployed medical lab platforms with Docker, Nginx & CI/CD achieving 99% uptime.
  • Walnut Solutions – Developed responsive Next.js applications, improving SEO and engagement by 30%, integrated APIs, and optimized UI performance.
  • Freelance Projects – Delivered custom software solutions such as BillCraft (multi-shop billing platform) and other MERN/Next.js platforms, driving measurable client growth and efficiency.

Key Projects

  • HireMe | Skillify – AI-powered skill development platform with 1,000+ users; Smart India Hackathon Winner 2024.
  • BillCraft (Freelance) – Multi-shop billing system for 18+ outlets and 200+ products with analytics dashboards.
  • Evento – Event management platform in Next.js, increasing student participation by 25% and supporting 500+ concurrent users.

Technical Skills

Languages: JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Java, C, C++
Frameworks: MERN, Next.js, React.js, Three.js
Databases: MongoDB, SQL, Firebase
DevOps: Docker, Nginx, Git, CI/CD, Portainer
AI/ML: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face, LangChain, NLP

Recognized as a Smart India Hackathon Winner and National Hackathon Champion, I bring not only technical depth but also leadership, having mentored 200+ students as Technical Lead of the APP Club. With my proven track record of delivering impactful freelance and professional projects, I believe I am well-positioned to contribute meaningfully at Unwired Labs.

Please find my resume attached for your consideration. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how I can support your team’s goals and deliver high-quality software solutions.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,

Sameer Bagul

My name is Sameer Bagul, a final-year B.Tech (Information Technology) student at PES Modern College of Engineering, Pune. I am a Full-Stack & AI Developer with DevOps expertise, bringing 2+ years of freelancing and professional experience in building scalable web applications, AI-driven platforms, and modern deployment pipelines.

In addition to my internships, my freelancing background has given me the opportunity to deliver high-quality solutions to real clients, enhancing my skills in end-to-end project execution, communication, and business impact. This blend of industry, freelance, and academic experience makes me confident in my ability to take ownership of projects and excel in software development roles at rancelab.

Professional Experience

  • LabsCheck, Pune – Built full-stack systems and automated lead operations for 100,000+ leads using AI agents; deployed medical lab platforms with Docker, Nginx & CI/CD achieving 99% uptime.
  • Walnut Solutions – Developed responsive Next.js applications, improving SEO and engagement by 30%, integrated APIs, and optimized UI performance.
  • Freelance Projects – Delivered custom software solutions such as BillCraft (multi-shop billing platform) and other MERN/Next.js platforms, driving measurable client growth and efficiency.

Key Projects

  • HireMe | Skillify – AI-powered skill development platform with 1,000+ users; Smart India Hackathon Winner 2024.
  • BillCraft (Freelance) – Multi-shop billing system for 18+ outlets and 200+ products with analytics dashboards.
  • Evento – Event management platform in Next.js, increasing student participation by 25% and supporting 500+ concurrent users.

Technical Skills

Languages: JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Java, C, C++
Frameworks: MERN, Next.js, React.js, Three.js
Databases: MongoDB, SQL, Firebase
DevOps: Docker, Nginx, Git, CI/CD, Portainer
AI/ML: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face, LangChain, NLP

Recognized as a Smart India Hackathon Winner and National Hackathon Champion, I bring not only technical depth but also leadership, having mentored 200+ students as Technical Lead of the APP Club. With my proven track record of delivering impactful freelance and professional projects, I believe I am well-positioned to contribute meaningfully at rancelab.

Please find my resume attached for your consideration. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how I can support your team’s goals and deliver high-quality software solutions.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,

Sameer Bagul

Pune, India

My name is Sameer Bagul, a final-year B.Tech (Information Technology) student at PES Modern College of Engineering, Pune. I am a Full-Stack & AI Developer with DevOps expertise, bringing 2+ years of freelancing and professional experience in building scalable web applications, AI-driven platforms, and modern deployment pipelines.

In addition to my internships, my freelancing background has given me the opportunity to deliver high-quality solutions to real clients, enhancing my skills in end-to-end project execution, communication, and business impact. This blend of industry, freelance, and academic experience makes me confident in my ability to take ownership of projects and excel in software development roles at Innostrat.

Professional Experience

  • LabsCheck, Pune – Built full-stack systems and automated lead operations for 100,000+ leads using AI agents; deployed medical lab platforms with Docker, Nginx & CI/CD achieving 99% uptime.
  • Walnut Solutions – Developed responsive Next.js applications, improving SEO and engagement by 30%, integrated APIs, and optimized UI performance.
  • Freelance Projects – Delivered custom software solutions such as BillCraft (multi-shop billing platform) and other MERN/Next.js platforms, driving measurable client growth and efficiency.

Key Projects

  • HireMe | Skillify – AI-powered skill development platform with 1,000+ users; Smart India Hackathon Winner 2024.
  • BillCraft (Freelance) – Multi-shop billing system for 18+ outlets and 200+ products with analytics dashboards.
  • Evento – Event management platform in Next.js, increasing student participation by 25% and supporting 500+ concurrent users.

Technical Skills

Languages: JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Java, C, C++
Frameworks: MERN, Next.js, React.js, Three.js
Databases: MongoDB, SQL, Firebase
DevOps: Docker, Nginx, Git, CI/CD, Portainer
AI/ML: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face, LangChain, NLP

Recognized as a Smart India Hackathon Winner and National Hackathon Champion, I bring not only technical depth but also leadership, having mentored 200+ students as Technical Lead of the APP Club. With my proven track record of delivering impactful freelance and professional projects, I believe I am well-positioned to contribute meaningfully at Innostrat.

Please find my resume attached for your consideration. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how I can support your team’s goals and deliver high-quality software solutions.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,

My name is Sameer Bagul, a final-year B.Tech (Information Technology) student at PES Modern College of Engineering, Pune. I am a Full-Stack & AI Developer with DevOps expertise, bringing 2+ years of freelancing and professional experience in building scalable web applications, AI-driven platforms, and modern deployment pipelines.

In addition to my internships, my freelancing background has given me the opportunity to deliver high-quality solutions to real clients, enhancing my skills in end-to-end project execution, communication, and business impact. This blend of industry, freelance, and academic experience makes me confident in my ability to take ownership of projects and excel in software development roles at Softype.

Professional Experience

  • LabsCheck, Pune – Built full-stack systems and automated lead operations for 100,000+ leads using AI agents; deployed medical lab platforms with Docker, Nginx & CI/CD achieving 99% uptime.
  • Walnut Solutions – Developed responsive Next.js applications, improving SEO and engagement by 30%, integrated APIs, and optimized UI performance.
  • Freelance Projects – Delivered custom software solutions such as BillCraft (multi-shop billing platform) and other MERN/Next.js platforms, driving measurable client growth and efficiency.

Key Projects

  • HireMe | Skillify – AI-powered skill development platform with 1,000+ users; Smart India Hackathon Winner 2024.
  • BillCraft (Freelance) – Multi-shop billing system for 18+ outlets and 200+ products with analytics dashboards.
  • Evento – Event management platform in Next.js, increasing student participation by 25% and supporting 500+ concurrent users.

Technical Skills

Languages: JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Java, C, C++
Frameworks: MERN, Next.js, React.js, Three.js
Databases: MongoDB, SQL, Firebase
DevOps: Docker, Nginx, Git, CI/CD, Portainer
AI/ML: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face, LangChain, NLP

Recognized as a Smart India Hackathon Winner and National Hackathon Champion, I bring not only technical depth but also leadership, having mentored 200+ students as Technical Lead of the APP Club. With my proven track record of delivering impactful freelance and professional projects, I believe I am well-positioned to contribute meaningfully at Softype.

Please find my resume attached for your consideration. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how I can support your team’s goals and deliver high-quality software solutions.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,

Sameer Bagul
